name: BrightMove
description:
BrightMove is a cube puzzle game I made for the Cult of Jabrils Stay@Home 2 days game jam. My first Game Jam.  Use arrow keys or WASD to move, you can also switch to Mobile mode if you want in game buttons .
The theme was "The more you use an action, the worse it will perform"

Unfortunately, I only finished 4 levels at that time. Enjoy!
This game is still in work in progress, feel free to comment if you have suggestions for improvement or features you want to see.

If you want to play this game on mobile, download the apk below.
